description: Internal refurbishment works to summer house including wall, roof and floor repairs and the installation of a log burner with a flue. Alterations to boundary treatment including replacement of a section of the front fence with a hedge with chain fence support, replacement of a section of boundary fence with a wall. Erection of a greenhouse with paved landscaping adjacent.
